#summary Resources for catalan language.

= Metatags =

Using as source http://www.diccionaris.cat/, get the tags related to each word (noun masculine/femenine, adjective, verb, etc). See the tags [http://www.diccionari.cat/abrev.jsp?ABRE=L here].

= Syllable division =

Using the rules found [http://www.aldeaglobal.net/cat5estrelles/Accentuacio.htm here] and defining the [https://github.com/tokland/grammy BNF parser] (see [https://code.google.com/p/tokland/source/browse/trunk/dicts/catala/metadata/dictionary.rb grammar])

= Source code =

$ svn checkout https://tokland.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/dicts/catala/metadata

$ ruby get_tags.rb
$ ruby download-all.rb
$ ruby dictionary.rb all 'output/*.html'
